product_name: Brooks Ravenna 4 Road-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: An ideal choice for mild pronators, the men's Brooks Ravenna 4 Road-Running Shoes deliver just a touch of stability and feature increased cushioning and flex from the previous season's model. Polyester and nylon mesh uppers are lightweight and airy for quick-drying performance; synthetic leather overlays help provide structure, support and protection. Arch saddles are easily adjustable for a just-right fit across insteps. Nylon stretch linings absorb and disperse moisture. Insole boards use a foam polymer alloy formulated to resist compression and rebound quicker than standard EVA. Midsoles feature BioMoGo polymer alloy foam, which provides cushioning, energy return and reduced foot fatigue; nontoxic additive helps midsoles break down in landfills. Anatomically placed DNA cushioning pods use high viscosity liquid to adapt instantly to each step, dispersing impact and customizing the cushioning to each runner and style. Diagonal Roll Bar high-density medial posts help control pronation and smooth transitioning from midstance to toe-off. Midfoot thermoplastic urethane arch shanks control torsional flex for control and support. Forefoot Stable-Pod configuration balances midsole and outsole components to set feet in an efficient, balanced position to maximize stability and responsiveness. Outsoles on the Brooks Ravenna 4 Road-Running Shoes are constructed of a mix of rubber compounds to optimize traction and durability. Outsoles also feature a special crash pad design that smooths out the landing zone, maximizing efficiency and feel throughout the heel strike. Flex grooves enhance midsole flexibility for an effortless, efficient ride that maintains cushioning. Closeout.
short_description: An ideal choice for mild pronators, the men's Brooks Ravenna 4 Road-Running Shoes deliver just a touch of stability and feature increased cushioning and flex from the previous season's model.
